entry.title: The Star that Wouldn't Die
entry.summary:
Author: ShadDork

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,134Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Jason Todd forgot a lot of things after the lazarus pit's putrid green waters helped restore him back to life. Most of it was unimportant information, things that he didn't need to worry about, after all, he could always relearn names, smells, and re-read books. Lost memories weren't as easy to deal with the loss of, but he could always make new ones. The memories that remained were largely traumatic, and the others were slowly being uncovered as time passed.He wished that Dick hadn't said that name, your name. Reigniting feelings and memories. Guilt was already a large part of his existence, and this new guilt about forgetting you entirely was just making everything worse. He shouldn't track you down in case it accidentally put you in danger. But he wanted to make sure that you were okay. It was a battle he lost against himself.As memories he thought were long lost start to return, can he continue to be in your life without dragging you down with him? Can he be in your life without you knowing who he is? He doesn't know, but he wants to try.

entry.title: Cracks in the Armor
entry.summary:
Author: arkham_bunniii

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,090Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 15

Summary: You were a former GCPD detective who left the force after Gotham’s corruption pushed you too far. Now, you work in the gray area of Gotham’s underworld—tracking weapons, gathering intel, and occasionally taking down the scum that even the Bat can’t reach.When the Arkham Knight arrives, he doesn’t just tear through Gotham… he takes it over in a single night. Every time you cross paths, it’s the same: a dangerous game of cat and mouse.You’re enemies. You should be enemies. But every fight, every standoff, pulls you closer, and something tells you there’s more to this soldier than the armor he wears.All your begging to ask is, what’s really beneath that helmet?

entry.title: Deranged
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,703Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 102

Summary: "In all honestly? It was his fault."Which all the Gotham untouchable family in the light and untouchable vigilantes at night. However, it all stopped by a single man, a citizen, a civilian no less with no background in anything besides school.No martial arts, no combat training or survival training. The guy is just a guy and that is a problem too. Well not for all of them but still something they aren't too eager to accept.Not yet at least, however they aren't willing to settle these feelings for [M/N].

entry.title: forwards beckon rebound
entry.summary:
Author: babsies0

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 621Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: For his fifteenth birthday, you get red streamers from the dollar mart and throw them all over your room. You get him a book too, carefully slipping it from the store shelves and tucking into your jacket, wrapping it in an old plastic bag. You’d chosen Kafka, the title forgotten to you now, but the beetle on the cover lingers behind your eyelids.

entry.title: Now That Your Rose Is In Bloom
entry.summary:
Author: transgendertommy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,386Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 20

Summary: You begin to train with Jason Todd and Bruce Wayne under the mantle of Nightingale, a vigilante you created. When Jason gets caught up in Dick's mess and Hank and Dawn recruit him, you go with. Before you know it you're traveling across the country with your boyfriend and becoming a Titan. It's what you always wanted. What could go wrong?A Jason Todd x reader fic that basically rewrites the entire show to include the reader and the relationship through your eyes.READ AUTHORS NOTE DONT SKIP THAT CHAPTER! entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,690Chapters: 19/30Kudos: 483

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n

entry.title: Scarlet
entry.summary:
Author: warisa_racket

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,205Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 34

Summary: ❣ exlover!JasonTodd x F!reader❣ 20th century anachronistic neonoir au; exes to lovers; no superheroes in this one, just a morally grey underworld criminal Jason Todd❣ Summary: You’re a law student moonlighting as a jazz club singer to make ends meet. Between balancing your studies and side-gig, you’ve willed yourself into believing that you’re over him, that you’re strong enough to detach yourself from him despite his efforts to nudge his way back into your life. Suddenly, you see him everywhere, and your life derails again as you fight to keep both you and Jason afloat.Exhausted and withdrawn, Jason has spent the last year trying to piece himself back together after your breakup. Enticed by numbness and increasingly reckless in his behavior, Jason let himself be pulled in too many different directions, the distractions and bustle of life demanding that he focus on anything but your absence. At his breaking point, he shows up to your job, just for a glimpse of you, to hear your voice lulling him into a false sense of hope that maybe he can remind you that he’s yours.

entry.title: Eleanor Rigby
entry.summary:
Author: Wastlanddaydream

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,330Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: "The swift summer breeze drags its way through Gotham cemetery. The sun high in the sky covered with a swath of clouds and the choking pollution of a city over run. In the furthest corner was his grave. Old flowers stopped rotting on the lips of the tombstone, smearing white rot atop the marble. The grass had begun to sprout once more from beneath the winter weather. The new strands swayed, strong and full of youthful bodies as if mocking the reason, you were there."An angsty Jason Todd/reader fic created from Eleanor Rigby.Cross posted on tumblr under goforthbythesea.

entry.title: Should, could, would...
entry.summary:
Author: Gilver

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,782Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 73

Summary: The sound of his fly unzipping, his belt and all its auxiliaries hitting the floor might have been loud, might have alerted you to his return home, if the heavy footfalls of his steel-toed boots hadn’t done that already. He didn’t know. He just knew that the siren song of your soiled panties was too intoxicating for him to resist. It might have been seconds, minutes, or hours before you found him here. He didn’t know. He just knew that whatever lecherous and visceral wound the lace of your panties being pressed to his tongue had been healing was torn open once more, and thoroughly salted by your presence.
